attr.q: Show sets A and B in the x-y plane.
attr.a:
It's easier for an equation with absolute values to express in a piecewise function.

\begin{aligned} &|x-y| \leq \frac{1}{2} \\ &\rightarrow \begin{cases} x - \frac{1}{2} \leq y &\text{if } y \leq x \\ y \leq \frac{1}{2} + x &\text{if } x < y \end{cases} \end{aligned}
